name: Envi Coin
description: Envi Foundation is built on a growing scientific company specialized in Smart City System, such as Internet of Things (IoT), Weather Monitoring Station (WMS), Indoor Air Quality Monitoring System (IAQ), Electricity Supply Distribution System (ESDS), Water Supply Distribution System (WSPS) Smart Farming Technologies (SFT), Continuous Emission Monitoring Systems (CEMS), Water Quality Monitoring System (WQMS), Gas Analysing and Detection System (GADS), Industrial 4.0 System, Smart Home IOT With over 2 decades of experience, we continue to welcome new challenges. Token feature Envi Foundation is based on proof-of-stake consensus and is built on top of the Ethereum blockchain algorithm. Envi Smart Contract is based on the ERC-20 token algorithm. Envi LP is held at Metamask, where you can trade our tokens. Liquidity will be locked forever, the developer will destroy the LP token after risking it. We chose the Ethereum blockchain because thanks to its low fuel costs, the Envi Coin will be the most democratic since its launch.
